title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published to npm as “ollama”.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as “ollama”.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) to use Ollama models as LLM or chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with model management, chat history, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with interactive prompts and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with strongly-typed models and streaming support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex for local Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that integrates Ollama models into channels via mentions or slash commands.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat template that connects to local Ollama instances with model picker and chat history.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible local deployments.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.
